content:
Verse 1:
G D
I wake up every morning, feeling so alone
Em C
Another day without you, I can't pick up my phone
G D
I try to keep on moving, but I can't help but think
Em C
Of all the times we had, and how you used to sing

Pre-Chorus:
Am C
I'm stuck in the memories
G D
Of what we used to be
Am C
But now you're gone and I can't breathe

Chorus:
G D
You were my everything
Em C
But now you're just a memory
G D
I'll try to move on, but it's not easy
Em C
Cause you were my everything

Verse 2:
G D
I see you in the street, and my heart skips a beat
Em C
I try to keep on walking, but I can't move my feet
G D
I thought we had forever, but you went away
Em C
Now I'm left here crying, and you're not here to stay

Pre-Chorus:
Am C
I'm stuck in the memories
G D
Of what we used to be
Am C
But now you're gone and I can't breathe

Chorus:
G D
You were my everything
Em C
But now you're just a memory
G D
I'll try to move on, but it's not easy
Em C
Cause you were my everything

Bridge:
Am C
I wish that I could turn back time
G D
And make you see that you were mine
Am C
But now you're gone and I can't find
G D
A way to leave you behind

Chorus:
G D
You were my everything
Em C
But now you're just a memory
G D
I'll try to move on, but it's not easy
Em C
Cause you were my everything

Outro:
G D
You were my everything
Em C
But now you're just a memory.

Chord Progression:
Verse: G D Em C
Pre-Chorus: Am C G D
Chorus: G D Em C
Bridge: Am C G D
Chorus: G D Em C
Outro: G D Em C
